subject: Re: [junit] testing generated file by a template engine
msgSnippet: ... I would probably start simple: - Compile the generated code. - Grep for certain words in its source -- Cédric http://testng.org [Non-text portions of this
messageBody:
On 2/8/06, amine achergui <amine.achergui@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
> I want to test the generated file by a template engine.
> The template files in my cas are supposed to produce java source code.
> I use velocity as template engine.
> That test harness may be considered as a none-unit testbut it code that
> must
> be tested.


I would probably start simple:

- Compile the generated code.
- Grep for certain words in its source

--
Cédric
http://testng.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
